item.title: Webroll
item.description: You can find more about what I do at the following places: Timlah.com, which includes information about all of my projects GitHub, which is where all of my public code lives Here, think of this as a landing point Mastodon, @Timlah, which is where my thinking out loud happens In future I plan to add resources for my future game development studio. In the past I ran a social group GeekOut South-West and oversaw the progress of its only sister site, GeekOut West-Midlands.

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: Send me an email Alternatively, check me out on mastodon: @Timlah

item.title: Static Websites
item.description: I decided to write this website in as quick a time as possible. I wanted to make something minimalist that I could use to point readers to different places on the web where I reside. To make this website, I used Hugo. If you have a need for a simple website quick at a reasonable price, reach out to me by email or Mastodon and talk to me about your needs.
